text: Elon Musk founded SpaceX in Hawthorne, California in 2002.
Apple Inc. released the iPhone 15 in September 2023 at their Cupertino headquarters.
Narendra Modi visited Chennai on Tuesday to inaugurate the new AIIMS hospital.
Infosys, headquartered in Bengaluru, reported a revenue of $4.6 billion last quarter.
The Amazon River flows through Brazil and is the world's largest river by discharge.
Sundar Pichai, CEO of Google, announced new AI features at Google I/O 2024.
The Taj Mahal, located in Agra, was built by Mughal Emperor Shah Jahan in 1653.
Microsoft acquired Activision Blizzard for $68.7 billion in January 2022.
Zensar Technologies, an RPG Group company, is headquartered in Pune, India.
Virat Kohli scored his 50th ODI century against Sri Lanka in Colombo last year.
